article_title: With Her Support Shrinking, Hillary Clinton Apologizes For Her Private Email Server

article_metadata.author: Doug Schoen

og.description: At a Labor Day campaign stop in Cedar Rapids, Iowa, former Secretary of State Clinton took another stab at addressing her ongoing email scandal. As she has consistently done all summer, Clinton assured reporters that she did not need to apologize for using her personal email account while serving as Secretary [...]
